reasoning_log: The matching process involved segmenting the descriptions into residential (Desc_1 to Desc_7) and public facility (Desc_8 to Desc_13) categories. For the residential areas, specific features like '陽台' (balcony, Desc_3 -> Image_3), '大衣櫃' (large wardrobe, Desc_4 -> Image_4), and '書桌與上方層架' (desk and upper shelf, Desc_6 -> Image_6) were used for precise differentiation. Desc_1 and Desc_2 were distinguished by focusing on the '玄關區' (entrance area) mentioned in Desc_2, which is more prominent in Image_2. For the public facilities, the descriptions were highly specific (e.g., '健身房', '吧台區', '撞球室'), allowing for direct 1:1 mapping based on the primary object visible in the image (Image_12 for gym, Image_10 for bar, Image_13 for billiards). Image_11 was chosen for the general '遊憩室' (recreation room) as it shows multiple game types (foosball/billiards). All 13 descriptions were successfully mapped to 13 unique images with high confidence.

matching_result_list.evidence: Image shows the main living area with a prominent wooden TV feature wall and sofa, fitting the '客廳/餐廳區' description.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 格局方正(長方形空間好擺家具), 室內採光普通(主要依賴嵌燈看不見窗戶), 通風可能較弱(看不到開窗需要依賴冷氣與電扇), 天花高度舒適(無壓迫樑柱感), 電視主牆已完成(免大裝修直接使用), 收納一般(電視牆與茶几有些收納但仍較凌亂), 地板易清潔(木紋地板適合家庭與寵物)

matching_result_list.evidence: Image focuses on the sofa area adjacent to a dark entrance door/cabinetry, supporting the '客廳/玄關區' and '玄關獨立區' tags.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 玄關獨立區(大門與客廳之間有過道較有隱私), 採光稍弱(室內偏暗需長開燈), 廚房緊鄰客廳(開放或半開放格局方便送餐), 收納空間有限(玄關與側邊層架已堆滿物品), 動線順暢(玄關進來直通客廳無明顯遮擋), 已裝冷氣(對上班族與學生居住舒適度高)

matching_result_list.evidence: Clearly shows a master bedroom with a large glass door leading to a balcony ('含陽台') and a visible bookshelf ('書架收納足夠').

extracted_feature.raw_description: 採光良好(大片落地窗與陽台門引入自然光), 通風佳(臥室直接連接戶外陽台), 陽台可晾衣(臥室外推門陽台實用), 視野開闊(可看到外面高樓景觀), 臥室空間充足(雙人床兩側仍保有走道), 已裝冷氣(睡眠舒適度佳), 書架收納足夠(床側整面層架提供書與雜物收納)

matching_result_list.evidence: Shows a master bedroom with a large wooden sliding wardrobe ('大衣櫃收納佳') and recessed ceiling lighting ('天花燈槽設計').

extracted_feature.raw_description: 格局方正(牆面平直好規劃衣櫃與床位), 天花燈槽設計(間接照明提升睡眠氛圍), 採光中等(看得到部分自然光), 大衣櫃收納佳(整面木作衣櫃適合家庭或情侶), 臥室隱私佳(單一出入口連接走廊)

matching_result_list.evidence: This is an alternate view of the master bedroom (Image_4), focusing on the large blank wall space ('牆面留白') and floor sockets.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 動線順暢(床尾到門口有完整走道), 牆面留白可加裝收納(未被利用的牆面可規劃吊櫃或層架), 天花高度舒適(無壓迫感), 插座預留(床側牆面有插座方便家電與手機充電)

matching_result_list.evidence: Shows a small, cluttered room ('空間偏小略顯壅擠') featuring a wooden desk and an upper shelf ('書桌與上方層架').
